title: How do I create a playlist?
answer:
Step 1 On the My music screen, touch Playlists > Create new playlist.   
 Step 2 Enter the playlist name and touch Save.   
 Step 3 In the displayed dialog box, touch OK. Select the desired songs and touch ADD.
